text: Dilwale is a 1994 Bollywood movie directed by Harry Baweja and produced by Paramjeet Baweja. The movie had Ajay Devgn, Sunil Shetty and Raveena Tandon playing in title role. Dilwale was hit in the boxoffice. The movie's music composed by Nadeem-Shravan and lyrics by Sameer became very popular that year. ==Soundtrack== Track # Title Singer(s) 1 "Kitna Haseen Chehra" Kumar Sanu 2 "Jeeta Tha Jis Ke Liye" Kumar Sanu, Alka Yagnik 3 "Mauka Milega To" Udit Narayan, Alka Yagnik 4 "Jeeta Hoon Jis Ke Liye" Kumar Sanu, Alka Yagnik 5 "Jo Tumhein Chahe" Kumar Sanu 6 "Saaton Janam Main Tere" Kumar Sanu, Alka Yagnik 7 "Ek Aisi Ladki" Kumar Sanu 8 "Jeeta Tha Jis Ke Liye (Sad)" Kumar Sanu ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1994 movies Category:1990s Indian movies
title: Dilwale
